refnamediv.refpurpose: Information about a publisher of a work

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The publisher element contains the name, and possibly location, of the organization that published a literary, artistic, scholary, or other work.

refsect2.title: Parents
refsect2.para: publisher may be contained in these elements:

example.title: Publisher name only
example.programlisting: <pub> <bookTitle>Deep Thoughts on Stuff</bookTitle> <publisher>Totally Groovy Publishing, Ltd.</publisher> </pub>

example.title: Publisher name and location
example.programlisting: <pub> <bookTitle>A User's Guide to Dirt</bookTitle> <publisher>Mother Nature Books, Boston, Massachusetts</publisher> </pub>
